Family And Friends Getaway At Mandarin Oriental, Macau Published on : Saturday, July 4, 2015
This summer, guests can spend quality time with their family and friends with Mandarin Oriental, Macau’s Family Fun and Friends Getaway packages. Both provide luxury and relaxation in a truly spectacular setting with special savings on a second room.
The Family Fun package starts from MOP 4,588 and includes:
One night’s accommodation in a luxurious suite
One complimentary Deluxe Room
Complimentary Internet access at the hotel
The Friends Getaway package starts from MOP 3,732 and includes:
One night’s accommodation in an elegantly appointed Deluxe Room
Second Deluxe Room at half price
Blending chic style with Oriental touches, the hotel’s spacious Deluxe Rooms and suites feature floor-to-ceiling windows offering stunning views of the South China Sea, Nan Vam Lake or Taipa Island, creating an atmosphere of tranquility. Featuring exquisite furnishing such as a large walk-in wardrobe, a king or twin beds swathed in satin linens, as well as a marble bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bath and Aromatherapy Associates amenities, each room and suite is made for comfort and luxury. Room guests enjoy exclusive access to the hotel’s 25-metre-long temperature-controlled outdoor infinity pool and whirlpool overlooking the South China Sea. The adjacent fitness centre is equipped with the latest Technogym equipment and a comprehensive heat experience to relieve stress and promote overall well-being.
The Family Fun and Friends Getaway package are both valid until 28 September 2015. Prices are subject to 10% service charge and 5% government tourism tax. The second Deluxe Room will be added automatically upon reservation with the same dates as the first suite or room. No refund or cash redemption for unused portion of the packages. The offers cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions or privileges, and are not valid for group bookings. Blackout dates apply.
